overview: "The town of Asti, Piemonte, in Italy, has in its park a very small pond in which there are a great number of turtles, a species 'Trachemys scripta and Trachemys scripta elegans' protected by the 'Movimento Nationale U.N.A. Onlus Uorno-Natura_Animal'”.  In spite of the very limited space in the pond, a spirit of well-being prevails, all is calm while each turtle tries to find its place even if it means falling into the water every now and then." - Light Cone
title: Tartarughe d’acqua
